name: Fire Escape Demake
description:
Game Description: 

Enjoy this demake of Happy Tree Friends - Fire Escape with non-violent content. It's a five-alarm fire and there's nobody but Flaky to help the trapped buddies get out of the burning building safely. Use your mouse to control Flaky left or right and bounce the falling jumpers safely to the waiting ambulance. Careful not to drop 10 buddies or the game is over.

Controls:

Z - Insert Coin
Enter - Start
Mouse - Move Flaky
F - FullScreen
1 - Toggle The SFX (Sounds)
2 - Toggle The Music

Credits to:

DATA EAST by creating Backfire! MUSIC: Stage Selection (Title Theme)

CAPCOM by creating Street Fighter II (Select Sound) and Megaman 1 (Disk Operating System game) Sounds
Active Enterprises by creating Action 52 (Sega Genesis Port) Game Over Theme
danylopez123 by creating the border of MAME he made to himself but he gave me permission to port it here.

Change Log:
Lag Fixed and Text Fixed
FullScreen Added
Toggle Music and SFX Added (danylopez123 has Requested that.)
Android Support (Playable on android)
Russell, Mime Flaky and Cuddles Sprites Changes
Volume gain in Musics Fixed
Secret Code Added
